Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon Mysterious Multi-Colored Light Patterns in Sky Over Reno, Nevada © 2008 by Linda Moulton Howe “I finally photographed the mysterious light with my digital camera and was surprised to see colored light patterns similar to the ones that were taken in Stephenville, Texas, during the mass sighting events in January 2008.” – R eno, Nevada, Resident D ecember 19, 2008 Reno, Nevada - The morning after my December 17, 2008, three hour news broadcast on Coast to Coast AM with George Noory , I received the following email from a Reno, Nevada, resident along with several photographs she had taken on December 10, 2008, after 9 PM Pacific over the Washoe Valley south of Reno. Her photographs are very similar to the videotape by David Caron near the Stephenville, Texas, Airport on January 19, 2008. See hot links to other Earthfiles reports in More Information. What are these multi-colored light patterns on video and still cameras? The Caron video (hot link after Reno images) shows an out-of-focus, disc-shaped object hovering in the sky from which the multi-colored patterns begin projecting outward for several minutes, changing shape every one-half second on the 30-frames-per-second videotape. Some dismissed the Caron videotape as an electronic glitch in his digital video camera. But the other multi-colored light patterns in the variety of geographical regions have all been photographed with digital still cameras. The Reno, Nevada, resident says in her email below, “I do know the light was there for several days before I photographed it.” R ed circle is Reno, Nevada. Straight south, the red star is the location of Washoe Valley. “Subject: Object Over Reno Date: December 18, 2008 To: earthfiles@earthfiles.com Hello Linda, I love your work and I thought that I would share this info with you to see if you might be interested. The photos were taken Dec. 10th, 2008, Wednesday night, and it was after 9:00 p.m. My daughter helped with this as she had just come back from visiting her boyfriend and saw me hanging off the second floor balcony. This angle looks southeast over the Washoe Valley. I haven't taken time to travel around the valley to see if the angle changes, too busy for Christmas. I do know the light was there for several days before I photographed it. The clouds are up and I can't tell if it's around now. But I can say the last time the night sky was clear, it was still there. My daughter and I had noticed a rather bright light over the Reno valley for several days. Thinking it may be a star we fairly ignored it until we noticed that it seemed to have different colors showing, but it was still hard to see.

I finally photographed the mysterious light with my digital camera and was surprised to see colored light patterns similar to the ones that were taken in Stephenville, Texas during the mass sighting events in January 2008. I will attach the photos. I did take several shots and I also took shots of stars in the distance to judge if I were jiggling my camera around. That was not the case. The stars in the shots are just bright spots, but the object in question was squiggling all over the place. Last time I looked out the window this thing was still sitting over the valley. I cannot determine how far up it is though. Thanks for your time. ENC: 8 attachments ” 8 Digital Images In Sequence D ecember 10, 2008, 9 PM Pacific, over Washoe Valley South of Reno, Nevada Earthfiles did not enlarge any image, but cropped around multiple light patterns where there was a lot of black sky so the image of the pattern itself would be as large as possible without Photoshop enlargement. All images © 2008 by Reno resident.
N ormal stars in opposite corners with mysterious multiple-colored object between. N ormal star in upper left corner with mysterious multiple colored object in lower right.

N ormal stars in opposite corners with mysterious multiple-colored object between. Stephenville, Texas, January 19, 2008, David Caron Videotape Segment and Selected Frames: Click Here to see excerpt of David Caron Videotape. F rom his home in Stephenville, Texas, home, resident David Caron used his JVC video camera to tape twelve minutes, beginning at 10:10 PM Central, near the Stephenville Clark Field Municipal Airport. He was on the front porch steadying his arm and camera against a post on the porch. You can hear the local road traffic steadily comi ng and goi ng throughout the videotape. You al so hear Davi d Caron speak peri odi call y with another person in the house. At one point, the two discuss that the pulsing multi-colored patterns in the sky look like “hieroglyphs.” [ Hundreds of image patterns in several minutes of digital videotape in which the pattern is changing twice a second.]

The Caron videotape and the Reno photos are also very similar to other photographs taken in Glen Rose, Texas, on January 20, 2008 O ne of many pulsing symbols watched by Joan of Glen Rose, Texas, at 5:30 AM Central, on January 20, 2008, seven hours after David in Stephenville videotaped pulsing symbols for nearly 13 minutes. Image provided by Steve Allen. Dublin, Texas, on February 9, 2008 F ebruary 9, 2008, multi-colored “symbol” flashed in night sky between 10:30 to 11 PM Central, over Dubli n, Texas, by spinni ng, di sc-shaped aeri al obj ect. Digi tal i mage © 2008 by Wendy Gai tan, wife of the Erath County Constable, Precinct 2, Dublin, Texas. Oswego, Illinois, on April 5, 2008 Fl ashi ng l i ght photographed through telescope around 11:45 PM Central, in Oswego, Illinois, on Saturday, April 5, 2008. Image © 2008 by Gabrielle Johnson. Kokomo, Indiana, on April 16, 2008

I f anyone else in the Reno and Washoe Valley, Nevada, region or any other locations has seen and/or photographed these changing, multi-colored light patterns, please contact: earthfiles@earthfiles.com . All requests for confidentiality are honored.
